channel.title: Rocket Launcher's laser is always in center of the crosshair
channel.description:
While replaying black mesa (steam) again, I noticed a funny mistake. You see, the laser of rocket launcher is coming from, the rocket launcher. At least I think it does. And when, player is running, he is pointing it in totaly diffirent direction, and the laser is still pointed into the center of the crosshair. I know it's not a bug, more like a little oversight, but when I saw it, my life was not the same anymore. Please fix it if it's possible.
And sorry if somebody else already reported that issue. I didn't find any simmilar thread.

item.title: Rocket Launcher's laser is always in center of the crosshair
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Three levels of aim:

  1. no scope, laser is all over the place.
  2. sturdy, little/no zoom, max run speed slows, laser is 95% stable.
  3. regular aim.

But the loss of a little realism simplifies it and takes out a good few days of dev time for an engineer that they can spend on Xen level productivity or bug fixes.
